titleStmt.title: "Editing the Eartha M.M. White Archive": Edited Documents, Summer 2016

figure.desc: Image courtesy of UNF Special Collections and Archives

div.head: "Editing the Eartha M.M. White Archive": Index to Edited Documents
div.p: University of North Florida students, faculty and staff are preparing the following draft documents as part of the pilot phase of the "Editing the Eartha M.M. White Archive" project. We have used an adaptation of TEI Boilerplate as a preliminary test interface for this edition.

Folder E4, item 1066. Letter from Albert Sims to Eartha M.M. White, Port Tampa City, July 20,1920 (Samantha Feaster)

Folder G5, item 1814. Letter from M. E. J. Washington to Eartha M.M. White, Jacksonville, FL, July 22, 1920. Author expresses condolences to Eartha M.M. White upon the death of a friend. (Joleen Stahl)
Folder B, no item number. A.L. Lewis, President of the Afro-American Life Insurance Company, Letter to Eartha M.M. White (Bethany)

Folder B5, item 1580. Sarah Best, Letter of Appeal - Release from Mental Institution. Handwritten letter of appeal from Sarah Best to Eartha M. M. White on 4/10/1929 concerning Best's release from Florida State Hospital, Chattahoochee. Transcription, edition, and encoding Aislinn Kelly.
